chunks.title: Algorand Network Support
chunks.body: Algorand Network: Energy-efficient blockchain with Pure Proof of Stake (PPoS). ~6,000 TPS with 4-5 second finality. Carbon-negative, ~$0.001 USD average fee. Founded by Turing Award winner Silvio Micali. 100% uptime since 2019. Native token: ALGO. NYLA supports transfers and swaps within Algorand network only.
chunks.summary_en: Energy-efficient blockchain with PPoS consensus. ~$0.001 fees, 6k TPS, carbon-negative.
chunks.summary_zh: 采用纯权益证明共识机制的节能区块链。约0.001美元费用，6k TPS，碳中和。
